These get the job done for me. Your own needs and preferences might vary from mine.

## Writing

+ [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) - Publishing system for literate programming and more.
+ [Positron](https://positron.posit.co/) - IDE with first-class support for Quarto and R from the creators of RStudio.
+ [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) - All-around good text editor.
+ [Emacs](https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs/) - Most powerful ~~operating system~~ text editor on Earth.
+ [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md/) - Note system for hyperlink enthusiasts.
+ [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) - Citation management system; never hand-write a bibliography again.


## Hardware

These days I'm using an M1 MacBook Air and an iPhone SE (3rd generation).
